profile.name: MR Sompharn VANGVERN
profile.tagline: Building modern web applications with clean code

about: Passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in both backend and frontend technologies. Specializing in building scalable web applications using PHP, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Experienced in database design, API development, and cloud deployment.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with Next.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL. Features include product management, cart system, and secure payment integration.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: WebSocket-based chat app built with Elysia.js and React. Supports multiple rooms, typing indicators, and message history.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Collaborative task manager with drag-and-drop interface, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Data visualization dashboard using React, Chart.js, and MongoDB. Real-time metrics and customizable reports.
